title: 'formlos, Type Foundry' releases 'formlos PlayR'..
content:
formlos ( formlos, Type Foundry ) finally releases 'formlos PlayR'..   
 [www.formlos.net/formlosTypeFoundry/formlos\_PlayR.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125214/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTypeFoundry/formlos_PlayR.htm)   
   
_A brandnew 'fun' type for display and headline usage..   
Two weights, One font.. Quite simple, but, hopefully, nice nonetheless.._      
   
 [www.formlos.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125214/http:/www.formlos.net/)
author: formlos : Thu, 2004-07-08 07:33
